title: Column aliases in dataset not reflected in expression builder
OB: After setting alias for a column in a dataset, when selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column name is still displayed instead of the alias.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset.
